author: Jessica
excerpt: 1. I have to make this s’mores ice cream pie! 2. My kids are in a cooking camp this week and it’s the cutest thing ever. Except everything they are making… they like better than what I make. 3. If you’re local to Pittsburgh, I’m doing a super fun event on June 26th! 4. How […]
text: 1. I have to make this s’mores ice cream pie! 2. My kids are in a cooking camp this week and it’s the cutest thing ever. Except everything they are making… they like better than what I make. 3. If you’re local to Pittsburgh, I’m doing a super fun event on June 26th! 4. How to have a sara murphy summer. 5. The trader joe’s aglio olio seasoning is SO good, I can’t even explain. I’ve gone through jars of it. It’s the perfect mix of garlicky, herby and spicy. Works on so much. 6. I need a cloud coffee more than anything in life. 7. TV things!! So excited that Ginny & Georgia is back on. I’m also watching And Just Like That and… meh. 8. Oh but can we talk about how the Hamilton original cast reuniting at the Tonys?! Incredible. Max and I were flipping out. 9. Kinda love the idea of turning your smartphone into a dumbphone.
html:
1. I have to make this s’mores ice cream pie!

2. My kids are in a cooking camp this week and it’s the cutest thing ever. Except everything they are making… they like better than what I make.

3. If you’re local to Pittsburgh, I’m doing a super fun event on June 26th!

4. How to have a sara murphy summer.

5. The trader joe’s aglio olio seasoning is SO good, I can’t even explain. I’ve gone through jars of it. It’s the perfect mix of garlicky, herby and spicy. Works on so much.

6. I need a cloud coffee more than anything in life.

7. TV things!! So excited that Ginny & Georgia is back on. I’m also watching And Just Like That and… meh.

8. Oh but can we talk about how the Hamilton original cast reuniting at the Tonys?! Incredible. Max and I were flipping out.

9. Kinda love the idea of turning your smartphone into a dumbphone.
